Methods

<static> Make_Validation_Object(validation) → {Object}

Ensures that that the validation object on the spec is complete with all defaults configured.

Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
validation Object <optional>

Optionally, the validation object that is defined as part of this Swagger API definition
Source:
  • validation/validate.js, line 6
Returns:

An object that contains the values passed in on spec.validation, plus any defaults for missing values

Type
Object

<static> Validate_Body(param, req, models, validationObj) → {Array}

Validates the body of the req that called validation.

Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
param Object

The Swagger param that was created for this operation
req Object

The request that this is validating
models Object <optional>

Optionally, the models that are defined as part of this Swagger API definition
validationObj Object

The validation object that is defined as part of this Swagger API definition
Source:
  • validation/paramTypes/body.js, line 6
Returns:

An empty Array if the value was "nothing" and not required, else an array containing an object with either an error property (which contains an Array of Error objects) or a value property that contains the value, parsed successfully if validation knows how, else the value unmodified.

Type
Array

<static> Validate_ParamType(param, value, models, allowMultiple) → {Array}

Validates the form of the req that called validation.

Parameters:
Name Type Argument Default Description
param Object

The Swagger param that was created for this operation
value Object

The value that was passed to be validated
models Object <optional>

Optionally, the models that are defined as part of this Swagger API definition
allowMultiple Boolean <optional>
 false

True if this param allowed multiple and the param type allows multiple, else false

<static> Validate_ParamType(param, ret) → {Object}

Gets the value to be passed back in the req if spec.validation.replaceValues === true.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
param Object

The Swagger param that was created for this operation
ret Object

The value that was returned from the paramType and parameter validation
Source:
  • validation/paramTypes/helper.js, line 8
Returns:

The values that was returned from the paramType and parameter validation, else the defaultValue if specified, else undefined.

Type
Object
